mapper.insert: MERGE into ugotfilm_movie using dual on (moviecode=#{moviecode}) WHEN MATCHED THEN update set title=#{title}, poster_url=#{poster_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR} when not MATCHED then insert (moviecode, title, poster_url) VALUES (#{moviecode}, #{title}, #{poster_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

MERGE into ugotfilm_director using dual on (personcode=#{personcode}) WHEN MATCHED THEN update set name=#{name}, profile_url=#{profile_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR} when not MATCHED then insert (personcode, name, profile_url) VALUES (#{personcode}, #{name}, #{profile_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

MERGE into ugotfilm_cast using dual on (personcode=#{personcode}) WHEN MATCHED THEN update set name=#{name}, profile_url=#{profile_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR} when not MATCHED then insert (personcode, name, profile_url) VALUES (#{personcode}, #{name}, #{profile_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
MERGE into ugotfilm_genre using dual on (genrecode=#{genrecode}) WHEN MATCHED THEN update set name=#{name} when not MATCHED then insert (genrecode, name) VALUES (#{genrecode}, #{name})
